title: Why do women have a knack for the support role?
body:
Because they understand that it's easiest to carry the weight of the team when paired with good support.

http://i.imgur.com/NFFg7gY.png

replies.body:
I figured it was because their backs were so much stronger, and thus much better at carrying around their ADC.

I mean, they'd have to have strong backs considering what they carry around on their chest all day every day.
This is actually why most ADC champs are female.

No woman I know main support.

Probably cause only one of them plays league. And she goes mid, jg and sometimes top.

Your friends list is a sausage fest then xD

ut of my female friends around half (50%) are main supports, 30% are mid mains around 15% are adc mains and the 5% left are junglers or tops. I main jungle so prob my sample size is biased towards junglers since I'm usually filling that role when I meet people on league
I said they had a knack for it. I didn't say they had to be exclusive to it.
It's a joke about brassiere, dude.

This guy gets it.

We're talking about this thing:
https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0305/6249/products/Nude_24_7_Classic_Tshirt_49e63e88-9845-453b-9ed2-6e0e0d39530b_500x.jpg?v=1480709114
because it is tematically the most feminine role.

I'm a dude, and I love to play support
(#OutragousGemPower
Are you related to Busty Demoness? XD

I haven't seen BD in a while, I'm suspecting a name change.

#Hey you, did you pull a Worst Morde NA on us?
Level 20, so either a smurf or someone else. But definitely not a name change.

You hear me nintendo?
Knack HD.
